name: fng-jq-upload
author: Mark Chapman <support@forms-angular.org>
description: jQuery file upload plugin for forms-angular, storing data in Mongo
**NOTE** If you are using wiredep you do not need all of the files in blueinp-file-upload bower.json.main.  You should exclude jquery.fileupload-ui.js, jquery.fileupload-jquery-ui.js
